name: One more song !
description:
Follow the story of a frontman who will do anything for his time in the spotlight to last... just a bit longer!

As the end of the show looms, he can't resolve to go back in the shadows backstage. No, he has to play one more song! The only thing is that his bandmates may need some convincing... and if he stops playing or singing, they will surely stop and pack their gear. No choice, he has to keep on playing until they are convinced, even if that means using his mouth and feet to get his way!

An adventure game inspired by the point-and-click classics.

Controls
  • Only requires a mouse. With a button.
Team
  • Vincent Schneider
  • Quentin Chevalier
